title: Google\Cloud\EssentialContacts\V1\Contact
name: Contact
description:
A contact that will receive notifications from Google Cloud.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.essentialcontacts.v1.Contact

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.email
params.description: Required. The email address to send notifications to. This does not need to be a Google account.

params.name: data.notification_category_subscriptions
params.description: The categories of notifications that the contact will receive communications for.

params.name: data.language_tag
params.description: The preferred language for notifications, as a ISO 639-1 language code. See Supported languages for a list of supported languages.

params.name: data.validation_state
params.description: The validity of the contact. A contact is considered valid if it is the correct recipient for notifications for a particular resource.

params.name: data.validate_time
params.description: The last time the validation_state was updated, either manually or automatically. A contact is considered stale if its validation state was updated more than 1 year ago.
